[B]Server Features:[/B] - Newest Runescape Hitmarks. - Perfect Switching. - Better Combat. - 100% Uptime. - Friendly and active community. - Server & Website Daily Updates. - Very Stable. - 602 Skilltab. - A team of hard working developer's ready to add new content. - Pk Points for killing players. - Voting Points both with amazing reward shops. - Donation system with points to buy items from shops. - Plenty of bosses to defeat! - Newest loading bar and log in screen - Fully Working XP Counter (With sprite flow & comma support) - Stable VPS

@Elrick wrote:

Looks like a regular RSPS, but this advertisement needs some beefing up. Things like “lots of bosses” could be changed into a picture depicting which ones you have or something.
